verses.roman:
guhā-pidhānaṁ nirbhidya
gopān niḥsārya kṛcchrataḥ
stūyamānaḥ surair gopaiḥ
praviveśa sva-gokulam

synonyms: guhā—of the cave; pidhānam—the blockage; nirbhidya—breaking; gopān—the cowherd boys; niḥsārya—leading out; kṛcchrataḥ—from the dangerous place; stūyamānaḥ—being praised; suraiḥ—by the demigods; gopaiḥ—and by the cowherd boys; praviveśa—he entered; sva—His own; gokulam—cowherd village.
translation: Kṛṣṇa then smashed the boulder blocking the cave's entrance and led the trapped cowherd boys to safety. Thereafter, as the demigods and cowherd boys sang His glories, He returned to His cowherd village, Gokula.
